body_html:
Ok, problem seems to be solved! How I fixed it (after many, many tries):

  1. Installed CUDA 9.1 using apt-get, following the instructions in this link: https://cryptoandcoffee.com/mining-gems/cuda-9-0-install-ubuntu-16-04-apt-get/
  2. Installed PyTorch using pip
  3. Rebooted

Now I get:
~$ python -c 'import torch; print torch.cuda.is_available()'
True
